name: pie
description: make a pie chart with description
author: rickotoole <rick@rockerbox.com> (http://rockerbox.com)

scripts.pretest: mkdir -p build && node -e 'process.stdout.write("var version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\"; export * from \"../index\"; export {version};");' > build/bundle.js && rollup -f umd -u pie -n pie -o build/pie.js -- build/bundle.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/pie.js -c -m -o build/pie.min.js && rm -f build/pie.zip && zip -j build/pie.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/pie.js build/pie.min.js
